roleset.name: to meet unexpectedly

example.name: transitive with adverbials
example.text: In a meeting with Premier Li Peng on Monday , Mr. Nixon said that he hoped [0] he would n't encounter guards with machine guns during his visit to the U.S. Embassy .
example.arg: during his visit to the U.S. Embassy

example.name: Arg 1 only
example.text: an encounter with a street-corner clarinetist

example.name: Both args
example.text: Elian Gonzalez's first encounter with President Fidel Castro

roleset.note: ENCOUNTER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'encounter' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from encounter.01-v predicate notes)
ENCOUNTER-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to 'encounter.01-v'. No vn class. Framed by Katie. (from encounter.01-n)
